name: Iron
description:
Controls:

  • W - Forward
  • S - Backwords
  • A - Left
  • D - Right
  • LShift - Sprint
  • C - Duck
  • R - Reload
  • ESC or X to open options
  • Duck while sprinting slides

Update 1.1

  • Removed Steam VR plugin
  • Added Options Menu with Mouse Sensitivity setting
  • Fixed incorrect texture in the starting level

Update 1.2

  • Fixed Options Menu not working on the last level
  • The Options Menu now opens with menu buttons select-able without using "tab"
  • Fixed "Rebuild reflections needed" notification on level 8
  • Added Icon
